General.Name: Northern Drilling Ltd
General.Description: Northern Drilling Ltd. operates as an offshore drilling contractor to the oil and gas industry. The company primarily engages in acquiring and operating offshore drilling assets, as well as involved in drilling in ultra-deep water environments. Northern Drilling Ltd. was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Hamilton, Bermuda.
General.Address: Par La Ville Place, Hamilton, Bermuda, HM 08
